items.sentence: You'll be able to use a calculator while you're taking the test.
I ate breakfast quickly so I would be in time for the first bus.
Yesterday the alarm clock didn't go off and Kurt didn't wake up.
Someone broke into my office and stole some important documents.
Tom is trying to earn enough money to buy himself a new trumpet.
I've asked everyone I know about that, but no one could help me.
I learned how to ride a motorcycle when I was sixteen years old.
Tom invited all his friends for a Christmas dinner at his house.
Tom doesn't have enough money to buy the computer that he wants.
I think that it's about time that I had a serious talk with Tom.
